title: What mid-70s thru 80s song has the word ‘paradise’ in it? - Quora

response.answer_text: So….70s & 80s only….that cuts out some good ones but, Two Tickets To Paradise - Eddie Money Just Like Paradise - David Lee Roth Riviera Paradise - Stevie Ray Vaughan Paradise by the Dashboard Light - Meat Loaf Cheeseburger in Paradise - Jimmy Buffett Paradise City - Guns N' Roses Paradise - Styx Rockin' the Paradise - Styx Lost Cause In Paradise - Wishbone Ash Postcards From Paradise - Ringo Starr Rose in Paradise - Waylon Jennings Paradise - Phoebe Cates Pimper's Paradise - Bob Marley & the Wailers Paradise - John Prine Pastime Paradise - Stevie Wonder Almost Paradise - Mike Reno & Ann Wilson Another Day in Paradise - Phil Collins Bloodbath In Paradise - Ozzy Osbourne Halfway to Paradise - Tony Orlando Paradise Is You - La Roux

Here are a few of my favorite mid-’70s through ’80s songs with the word ‘paradise’ Paradise - Change - I’ve always thought this beat was real ripe for a sample. Maybe it’s been used already.  Pastime Paradise - Stevie Wonder  Pimper’s Paradise - Bob Marley  Bird of Paradise - Snowy White  Paradise City - Guns N’ Roses  I’ve Never Been to Me - Charlene - before the title she sings “I’ve been to paradise, but…”  Cheeseburger in Paradise - Jimmy Buffett
